just the kind of information we're

35-story 251 unit luxury condominium in

growing crop of green apartment

some pretty nice views along with

all the way around me there the whole

from Sun no green building would be
complete without a green roof and much
of the water used in the building is
reused on site down in the basement a
1.8 million dollar water treatment

Schwab of Sierra Club green home who
pointed out some of the green features
of these apartments we looked at the
efficient appliances so we've got a

what's pure roll roll is recyclable in
